title: Was fun until ads ruined it.
text: The game can be kind of repetitive, but it‚Äôs still super fun. I enjoyed playing it for 10-15 minutes at a time. That is, until the ads ruined it. The ads used to be manageable. They would play after each level and you could skip the majority of them after 10-15 seconds or somethin, but then all of a sudden they would interrupt mid level and play for a solid 30 seconds. Obviously ads are to be expected with these games, but they started to become absolutely obnoxious. Deleted immediately.

title: The amount of ads is downright disrespectful
text: I have never in my life experienced such a repulsive amount of greed from any game developer that they would have the utter audacity to put ads not only before and after each level, but also in the middle of each level. On top of that, there are banner ads throughout. It is practically impossible to play the game for longer than 5 seconds before another ad wall pops up.

title: Fun. But..
text: If you like being interrupted mid-level to watch ads, therefore causing you to mess up, then this is your game. Not to mention the fact that you have to watch two ads in between every level on top of that. The game itself isn‚Äôt good enough to pay to have ads removed. All levels are pretty much the same.
